snippet.text: # cmd to trigger an automated build. # Remember to wrap the command as a string if you # intend to send it via secure shell protocol. cd ~/rpmbuild/SPECS/ && \ rpmbuild --short-circuit -b[N] \ --target=`uname -m` --define 'kernel_version x.y.z' \ file.spec \ 2> ~/Logs/module-name-err.log \ |tee ~/Logs/module-name-out.log

$< import rpm import datetime
spec = rpm.spec($GEDIT_CURRENT_DOCUMENT_PATH) date = datetime.date.today().strftime("%a %b %d %Y") headers = spec.packages[0].header version = headers['Version'] release = ".".join(headers['Release'].split(".")[:-1]) packager = headers['Packager'] newheader = "* %s %s - %s-%s\n- " % (date, packager, version, release) return newheader >
